folder:
SVARContents
Structural vector autoregressions: SVAR objects and functions
Constructor
SVAR – Convert reduced-form VAR to structural VAR. SVAR objects can call any of the VAR methods (functions). In addition, the following functions are available for SVAR objects.
Getting information about SVAR objects
fprintf – Format SVAR as a model code and write to text file.
get – Query SVAR object properties.
sprintf – Format SVAR as a model code and write to text string.
Simulation
srf – Impulse, or shock, response function.
Stochastic properties
fevd – Forecast error variance decomposition for SVAR variables.
Manipulating SVAR objects
sort – Sort SVAR parameterisations by squared distance of shock reponses to median. See help on VAR objects for other functions available.
Getting on-line help on SVAR functions help SVAR help SVAR/function_name
Getting on-line help on SVAR functions that are inherited from VARs help VAR help VAR/function_name
